Activity: Arrive at the hospital, log in, and check emails. Look for any updates on the EHR system from @ehrdev-1 or @ehrdev-2, or any important announcements from @clinlead-1. Reply to emails.
Review standardized protocols for assessing influenza symptoms. Refresh my knowledge of the specific symptoms to watch out for.
Review the patient schedule and patient charts, with attention to patients at high risk for influenza complications.
Begin patient assessments, focusing on thoroughness and accuracy in assessing influenza symptoms.
Enter patient data into the EHR, paying close attention to detail and utilizing the available data entry tools to ensure accuracy.
Lunch break. Chat with colleagues in the break room.
Continue patient assessments and EHR data entry.
Email @trainer-1 to ask if any training opportunities related to EHR usage or influenza assessment are available.
Prepare for shift handover. @rn-1 and @rn-3 for shift handover.
Log out and leave for the day.
